discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: @gares we should add `--ignore-constraints-on` in the CI file for coq-dev.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: @gares can you revive this PR? (Rebase + required fix for coq-dev?)

discussion.author: gares
discussion.comment:
I've rebased it and it turned out to be a no-op (in some way the changes are already in master).
Hence github thinks the PR was merged, since it's tip is contained in master (it is actually master).
well...

tags.description: PR that needs to be fix (generally because reviewers asked to).
